actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide that a combination of cities having an aggregate population of 50,000 or more shall be eligible to be an applicant.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide that a combination of cities having an aggregate population of 50,000 or more shall be eligible to be an applicant for grants to finance community development programs under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide that a combination of cities having an aggregate population of 50,000 or more shall be eligible to be an applicant.
